name: The last asteroid
description:
Save the Earth from asteroids!

You controll the moon. There is only ONE controll in this game. Use any button (I would recommend SPACE) to change the moon rotation way. So you can hit the asteroids. Earth has four lives.

How does it match the theme? The theme is "Delay the inevitable", so you can delay the end of Earth and humanity by hitting asteroids.

It's all made by myself. So the graphics are not very good. I'm the programmer, so the code is quite well (But still written very fast and not accurate). 

It's the first time, when I was recording sounds for a game. They are pretty terrible xD

The video about the game's creation will be on this channel.
